name: aesthetic-computer-micro
description: A portable Fedora based environment for running and hacking on aesthetic-computer.

scripts.reset-and-build: npm run reset && npm run build
scripts.boot: cd machine; docker compose run aesthetic
scripts.build: cd machine; docker compose run --build aesthetic
scripts.reset: cd machine; docker compose down; docker rm -f $(docker ps -aq --filter 'name=aesthetic-run'); docker rmi aesthetic-micro -f

author: Jeffrey Alan Scudder
